LanguageData.Momigalite.label: Momigalite
LanguageData.Momigalite.description: Rice Husks that have been compressed into briquettes for fuel. Briquette is a broad term that describes a compressed block of combustible biomass. Their primary use is to help start a fire.
LanguageData.TatamiStraw.label: Crafting straw
LanguageData.TatamiStraw.description: A bundle of straw set aside for crafting certain clothes, objects, and buildings.
LanguageData.TatamiG.label: Tatami (1quire)
LanguageData.TatamiHG.label: Tatami (0.5quire)
